title: Jan Schlegel
text:
🎓 Master of Science (M.Sc. ETH) in Statistics

🏛️ ETH Zurich | 📍 Zurich, Switzerland | 📅 Sep 2023 - Sep 2025


GPA: 5.98 / 6.00


Relevant Coursework: Machine Learning for Healthcare; Probabilistic AI; Statistical Learning Theory; Introduction to Machine Learning; Causality; Computational Statistics; Fundamentals of Mathematical Statistics; High Dimensional Statistics; Bayesian Statistics; Image Analysis and Computer Vision; Deep Learning; Time Series Analysis
Semester Paper: Extrapolation and Distributional Robustness for Climate Downscaling
Mentor for New Students



🎓 Special Student Statistics

🏛️ ETH Zurich | 📍 Zurich, Switzerland | 📅 Feb 2022 - Feb 2023


GPA: 6.00 / 6.00


Voluntarily enrolled to take advanced courses in statistics
Coursework: Applied Time Series, Applied Multivariate Statistics



🎓 Bachelor of Arts in Business and Economics

🏛️ University of Zurich (UZH) | 📍 Zurich, Switzerland | 📅 Sep 2019 - Feb 2023


GPA: 5.87 / 6.00


Finished the degree with 215 ECTS (instead of 180 ECTS)
Major in Banking and Finance (150 ECTS); Minor in Applied Probability and Statistics (30 ECTS)
Relevant Coursework: Likelihood Inference; Statistical Modelling; Numerical Methods in Informatics; Introduction to Machine Learning; Introduction to Statistics; Introductory Econometrics Thesis: Portfolio Value at Risk Forecasting with GARCH-Type Models (Grade: 6.00/6.00)
